description:
Located in St. Charles, Illinois, the law firm of Mirabella, Kincaid, Frederick & Mirabella, LLC, is dedicated to helping our clients with the legal issues that affect them the most. Serving DuPage, Kane, Cook, Kendall, Lake and Will counties, as well as the entire Chicago metro region, the attorneys at our law firm combine their 200 years of legal experience to provide the highest level of legal service possible.

As seasoned litigators and effective mediators, our attorneys are devoted to protecting our clients' rights, interests and freedoms in the face of the most serious legal challenges. Through a personalized approach focused on our clients' specific needs and goals, our attorneys provide effective assistance and support for those with legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Family law and divorce, including child custody and support, property division and other domestic relations issues
  • Employment law matters pertaining to sexual harassment and employee discrimination
  • Personal injury and construction accident litigation
  • General civil litigation and commercial litigation
  • Probate and estate litigation
  • Criminal defense

Since 1949, our law firm has successfully served the individuals, employees, business owners and families of our community. If you have a legal matter you need to address regarding one of our practice areas, you can contact the law firm of Mirabella, Kincaid, Frederick & Mirabella, LLC, to schedule a consultation with one of our experienced attorneys.
